Key Match Events: Rilee Rossouw scored 109 runs off 56 balls
Anrich Nortje took four wickets in quick succession
Post-Match Reflections: Rilee Rossouw is named Player of the Match
Anrich Nortje's bowling was praised as top-class
Bangladesh struggled from the start due to quick dismissals of openers
Miscellaneous Highlights: Bangladesh were bowled out for 101 in 16.3 overs
